Text: Joe Rogan recommended this book at the end of a comedy bit (Talking Monkeys in Space 2009) so I'm interested.
Joe Rogan bring me here too.

I would recommend the Rogan Forum to those of you who were brought her by Joe. I was also watching his stand up and heard about this book. I genuinely enjoy Philosophical thought so this should be an interesting read.
THANK YOU JOE
